Description:
LARGE BLOCK IN A COURT LOCALE WITH POTENTIAL TO BUILD 3 TOWNHOUSES
This instantly appealing home on a huge 1077sqm offers an exceptional level of comfort in a privileged court locale that will provide an enviable lifestyle whether you nest, invest or develop (STCA). Beautifully maintained; the generous interior delivers both style and space, starting with a comfortable living room with French doors that lead from the open-plan domain maximising daylight use whilst inviting relaxing garden views into the home.
A centrally positioned kitchen equipped with a stylish island bench with handy breakfast bar is just what a growing family needs and an adjacent cosy lounge is a fabulous space for rest and relaxation. The interiors integration with the tranquil undercover alfresco area makes seamless indoor-outdoor entertaining possible.
Accommodation is restful and well zoned; featuring two robed bedrooms placed towards the rear of the home; complemented by the master bedroom in a separate wing at the front of the home; all serviced by a central family bathroom. Additionally, an open space in between the master and living lends itself to a study, kids space or even an ensuite for those who have imagination and foresight.
The outdoors is a magical space with plenty of private areas for enjoying the sunshine or entertaining on a grand scale with a huge tired lawn and paved areas complemented by an undercover deck. Poised on a sizeable 1077sqm approx. of land, there's also the potential to further extend the existing dwelling or redevelop (STCA).
Further highlights include stunning hardwood floors throughout, ducted heating and wall mounted air-conditioning for seasonal comfort. There is also plenty of off-street parking and easy access to the rear via side gates.
An enviable lifestyle awaits, just 600m from Maroondah Village where tasty cafés, takeaways, and a Coles supermarket provide convenience, and buses provide transport to Croydon station. Close to Chirnside Park Shopping Centre, Eastland Shopping Centre, and the Eastlink motorway, with easy access to elite schools including Luther College, Oxley Christian College, Tintern Grammar, and Yarra Valley Grammar.
